content:
So I am trying to get a project that uses an old version of nightly up and running on aarch64-apple-darwin. However, I get error: target 'aarch64-apple-darwin' not found in channel..

Has there been any thought on retroactively adding builds for new targets (maybe just tier two, or tier one) where possible? Had a discussion with the rustup chat on Discord, and it sounds like it may not be possible for aarch64-apple-darwin: https://discord.com/channels/442252698964721669/463480252723888159/892218837703987210
(we ended up deciding this isn't possible because you couldn't built a host toolchain for aarch64-darwin at the time)
